description: Credit hours display, logging system, and UI improvements

changes: Display credit hours as single value or range (e.g., '4 credit hours' or '1 - 3 credit hours')
Implemented logging system with configurable LOG_LEVEL (INFO, DEBUG, LOCAL)
Added cross-chunk search for complete ASU match data when truncated
Drag extension from anywhere on popup (minimized or maximized)
Position persistence - popup remembers position when clicking new rows
Updated ASU match display format: 'ASU SUBJ NUM • X credit hours'
Default position updated to top right corner
Added back arrow for ASU matches carousel
Updated match text: Exact match → Suggested matches
Updated text: match not found → Course not found
